item.title: Twelve months that crippled Jimmy Carter’s presidency
item.description: A hostage crisis in Iran, unrelenting inflation and a primary challenge from Ted Kennedy ensured Carter’s defeat in the 1980 election.

item.title: What we know about Jimmy Carter’s funeral plans
item.description: President Joe Biden said he has been in touch with Carter’s family and started the process to hold a state funeral.

item.title: Jimmy Carter’s death prompts condolences, praise around the world
item.description: Praise was widespread for Carter’s human rights activism, conflict-resolution work and kindness during his presidency and the following decades.

item.title: Biden extols Carter’s ‘decency’ when asked about lessons Trump could learn
Live updates: Jimmy Carter’s death prompts condolences, praise around the world
item.description: His son confirmed the death but did not provide an immediate cause.
